Author: BronArianwyn
Text: Im not condoning it at all but I've been in the exact boat all night long. From what I've surmised is its a bad habit but its an old habit. Familiar and its easy to want to fall  back into it when things feel out of control. its a bad form of grounding and coping, from my own experience.  Better to drink some water and lay down with a cup of tea until the fear passes and then go get yourself a snack.
